lines.text: Peekingneeses is weak in the knees and I don't like these, you sees?
You're an anemic dog and I likes bloodhounds, you see.
[Popeye has been slammed into a brick wall]
Oh, I'm mortarfied!

[answers the door]
Oh, hello, Popeye, you're just in time to take Fluffy for a walk!

[looking at the Pekingese]
I think I came a little too early if you ask me... A he-man like I am can't be seen with a girly dog like that one!
That's what you think. Bring him back in about an hour!
[shuts the door]
Hey, call your dorg back or he'll kill that pup to death!
[goes to help Fluffy but Bluto grabs him]
Let him fight his own battle!
[knocks Popeye into a brick wall]

[laughs]
A hole in one!
[in the middle of a fight]

[shakes Fluffy's hand]
Nice work, young fella!
[both get back to their punch-ups]

[punches Bluto]
One for the money, two for the show, three to get ready and four to go!
[last lines]
I'm Popeye the Sailor Man!
[Fluffy barks twice]
I'm Popeye the Sailor Man!
[Fluffy barks twice]
Just 'cause you're taller, don't pick on someone smaller / I'm Popeye the Sailor Man!
[Fluffy steals his pipe and toots on it]
